saM tE# vAqyurmA#taqriSvA# dadhAtUttAqnAyaiq hRuda#yaqM ~Myadvili#ShTaM | 
dEqvAnAqM ~MyaScara#ti prAqNathE#naq tasmai# ca dEviq vaSha#Dastuq tuBya$M || 
sujA#tOq jyOti#ShA saqha Sarmaq varU#thaqmA&sa#daqH suva#H | 
vAsO# agnE viqSvarU#paq(gm)q saM~Mvya#yasva viBAvasO || 
udu# tiShTha svaddhvaqrAvA# nO dEqvyA kRuqpA | 
dRuqSE ca# BAqsA bRu#haqtA su#SuqkvaniqrA&gnE# yAhi suSaqstiBi#H || 14
